uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.util

Class KLabel

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.util.KLabel

  • public class KLabel
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class that heuristically converts concept-names or property-names, which may be in "camel-back" notation, into versions that are hopefully suitable for being displayed to an end-user. Will produce either "concept-format" labels (begining with upper-case) or "property-format" (begining with lower-case).
